Type.Name: ColorSetHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ColorSetHandler(object o, ColorSetArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ColorSetHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ColorSetHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ColorSetHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ColorSetHandler is removed from the event.
